short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Apex Legends Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Apex Legends background. Apex Legends wallpaper themes for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Apex Legends wallpapers each time a new tab is opened.
2. Select or favorite Apex Legends backgrounds randomly via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated search bar powered by Google.
4. Convenient links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick links to your most frequently visited websites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel addition for faster website access.
10. Direct links to Google apps.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Simplified sharing to social media platforms.
13. One-click access to download wallpapers.
14. Quick links to online gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your new Apex Legends tab.
